Class MeetingManGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • MeetingManGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MeetingManGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A GUI class for the meeting manager. It is ugly but we had no time
    Author:
    AC12001 17/18 group 2

      • editEvent

        public void editEvent()
        Edit an event or if a editingEvent doesn't exist, add it. If addingToAll is set to true, add this event to all selected diaries
